attributes.action: investigate and prosecute Jacqui Smith,  and Tony McNulty, for embezzlement of taxpayers money in connection with their second home expenses. They should resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: jacqui smith and tony mcnulty have embezzled taxpayers money under false information. they should be prosecuted and made to resign immediately. how can anyone trust the home secretary any more when she has behaved in a dishonest way? other ministers involved in the gravy train should also resign.

rejection.details: Your petition is very similar to this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/expenses-fraud/ have you considered adding your signature to that instead?
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
